comments.author: Emma
comments.content:
You can LOOK at Amazon, but you should ORDER at Indiebound http://www.indiebound.org/hybrid?filter0=dirt+candy&x=0&y=0
or BUY at your local independent bookstore.  Just sayin'....

comments.author: John
comments.content: Tell me it includes the recipe for Jalapeno hush puppies with maple butter, and I'm buying it TODAY!

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Indeed it does, and they are crazy delicious.

comments.author: Mark
comments.content: I won a signed copy of this book from raspberry eggplant on facebook. Great format and good read.

comments.author: Mark
comments.content: John, the recipe is on page 106!!!!

comments.author: Katherine Martinelli
comments.content: I adore Dirt Candy (those hush puppies with maple butter - swoon!) and am so intrigued by her cookbook. Thanks for sharing your thoughts!

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.content: I love your site! You should post some of your food pics on FlauntMyFood.com   it could help get you more readers.

comments.author: Maureen | Orgasmic Chef
comments.content: I love vegetables, I'm a grandmother AND I'm a badass so I suspect this book would be for me too.  I'm off to check it out.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: I was hoping someone would say that!!

comments.author: Patrick B.
comments.content: Whoa... I had "Wish LIsted" this but hadn't "looked inside." That is just amazing. Looks like a joy to read. I'll purchase it soon for sure. Some of the recipes look a little daunting for the home cook, but it's worth owning such a cool book.

comments.author: lazysmurf
comments.content: I adore this book! I hope I can someday actually cook from it, it doesn't really go with laziness...
